design_philosophy.core_concept: Structured Growth. The design should feel like a precise plan for the futureâ€”clean lines, clear milestones, and organic progress.
design_philosophy.visual_style: Swiss High-Contrast meets Organic Earthy. High legibility, structured grids, warm backgrounds to reduce eye strain during long study sessions.

typography.import_instruction: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Outfit:wght@300;400;500;600;700&family=Plus+Jakarta+Sans:wght@400;500;600;700&display=swap');

primary.name: Growth Green
primary.usage: Primary CTAs, Active States, High Scores

secondary.name: Blueprint Slate
secondary.usage: Secondary buttons, inactive icons, structural borders

dashboard_grid.classes: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-6 p-6
dashboard_grid.rules: Widgets must stretch to fill height. Use col-span-2 for main charts.

landing_page.classes: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-8 px-6 py-12 max-w-7xl mx-auto
landing_page.rules: Asymmetrical layout. Hero section takes 8 cols, supporting visual takes 4.

cards.style: Flat with 1px border. No heavy shadows.
cards.classes: bg-card border border-border/60 rounded-xl shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-300

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-11 px-8 rounded-full font-medium transition-transform active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary/10 text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/20 h-11 px-8 rounded-full font-medium
buttons.outline: border-2 border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary/5 h-11 px-8 rounded-full font-medium

inputs.classes: h-12 rounded-lg border-slate-200 bg-slate-50/50 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 focus:border-primary transition-all

visual_enhancers.tracing_beam: Use for 'Skill Gap' cards to highlight missing skills. Animate a border gradient.
visual_enhancers.noise_texture: Add a subtle noise texture to the main background to reduce digital flatness.

hero_student.alt: Student studying in a grand library
hero_student.usage: Landing page hero section, right side or background with overlay

team_collaboration.alt: Diverse team collaborating in modern office
team_collaboration.usage: Career Roles section or 'Future You' visualization

abstract_growth.usage: Background for the 'Roadmap' section or login page side panel

skill_radar.style: Minimalist grid, no background fill, thick strokes (3px)

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -20 }} transition={{ duration: 0.4 }}
motion.stagger_children: variants={{ hidden: { opacity: 0 }, show: { opacity: 1, transition: { staggerChildren: 0.1 } } }}

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic 'SaaS Blue' gradients. Stick to the defined Earthy/Professional palette.
Ensure all interactive elements have a hover state that explicitly changes text color if background changes.
For the Roadmap, create a custom vertical timeline component. Do not use a generic list.
All charts must be accessible. Use patterns or high-contrast borders if color is the only differentiator.
